about_the_game:
(IATA: FRA, ICAO: EDDF)

A major international airport located in Frankfurt, the fifth-largest city of Germany. The main hub for Lufthansa including Lufthansa Cargo. Features two passenger terminals with a capacity of approximately 65 million passengers per year, four runways and extensive logistics and maintenance facilities.

Terminal 1 has a total of 103 gates, which include 54 gates equipped with jetways (25 in Concourse A, 18 in Concourse B, 11 in Concourse C). Concourse Z sits on top of Concourse A sharing the same jet bridges between both concourses. Flights to non-Schengen destinations depart from the Z gates and Schengen flights depart from the A gates. Frankfurt Airport has four runways of which three are arranged parallel in an east-west direction and one in north-south direction.

FRA is the busiest airport by passenger traffic in Germany as well as the 4th busiest in Europe after London Heathrow Airport (also available as add-on for Tower! Simulator 3), Paris–Charles de Gaulle Airport and Amsterdam Airport Schiphol. The airport is also the 13th busiest worldwide by a total number of passengers in 2016, serving more than 300 destinations in 5 continents, making it the airport with the most direct routes in the world.

name: Tower! Simulator 3 - EDDF Airport

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: IATA: FRA ; ICAO: EDDF - A major international airport located in Frankfurt, the fifth-largest city of Germany, main hub for Lufthansa. FRA is the busiest airport by passenger traffic in Germany as well as the 4th busiest in Europe, so be prepared to control some busy days here!
